item.title: Generate PDF Reports for Free in Oracle Apex Using PL-JRXML2PDF and iReport Designer
item.description: Using Jaspersoft’s free iReport Designer tool and the open source PL-JRXML2PDF project, you can generate PDF reports from Oracle Apex for free, without having to install the JasperReports and JasperReports Server components. Watch my video tutorial to find out how.
